title: We are hiring an experienced Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager for performance-driven marketing.
job_overview:
We are hiring an experienced Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager for performance-driven marketing.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on performance

Responsibilities:

Manage ad accounts on Google and Meta.

Optimize campaigns for best performance.

Work in a remote-first environment.

Requirements:

Over 1 year experience managing paid ads.

Familiar with ad KPIs and performance metrics.
